title: Blizzard did it, it's your turn Riot!!!
body:
With the Warcraft movie having premiered yesterday, of course i was there, it is time that Riot considers to make a movie about the game we all love!

C'mon Riot, you can do it, you have enough material for 3 movies at least.

Noxus-Demacian wars
Noxian invasion of Ionia
Freljord civil war

JUST DO IT!!!
